column1: Local Foods////My husband chose to eat outside as the October day was the first break in the usual Houston heat & humidity. Â There is a modest
column3: outside eating area with about 4-6 tables and a bar styled counter with barstools around the perimeter of the outdoor eating area. I really appreciated the uncommon and sturdy white solid surface (think Corian
column4: silestone): smooth and easy to clean thoroughly. This counter is so much better than the usual counters made of wood that warps
column5: gets uneven and is hard to clean well.
